text: "Reunited" is a 1979 song by R&B; duo Peaches & Herb. It is the second single from their album 2 Hot. It went to number 1 in the United States, Canada and Spain, number 4 in the United Kingdom, number 8 in Australia, number 2 in New Zealand and the Netherlands and number 3 in Ireland. ==References== Category:1979 songs Category:1970s ballads Category:R&B; ballads Category:Johnny Logan (singer) songs Category:Peaches & Herb songs Category:Louise Mandrell songs Category:Lulu songs Category:Cliff Richard songs Category:Faith No More songs
title: Reunited (song)
